result.markdown: --- title: Zak Varty about: template: solana links: - icon: twitter text: twitter href: "https://twitter.com/zakvarty" - icon: youtube text: YouTube href: "https://www.youtube.com/@zakvarty" - icon: github text: Github href: "https://github.com/zakvarty" - icon: google text: "Google Scholar" href: "https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=3H4vg4cAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao" freeze: true engine: knitr # Code blocks normally specify the engine to use. To get inline R code to # evaluate without any code blocks in document, you have to specify the engine # within that document or at the project level. # https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/issues/5349#issuecomment-1543585217 --- :::{#hero-heading} ::: small_right ::: I am a statistician, data scientist and educator. I work as a Teaching Fellow at [Imperial College London](https://www.imperial.ac.uk/statistics) where I teach courses and supervise research projects in statistics, data science and data ethics. My research interests are at the intersection of applied and methodological statistics. I particularly enjoy developing efficient inference methods for non-standard data generating mechanisms and data science projects with environmental or industrial applications. When I'm not in front of my computer, I enjoy distance running and I love to read üèÉ üìñ. Ideally, these activities are accompanied by a good cup of coffee and a large slice of cake! :::
